entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json source generation and records from another assembly #62374
  • DllImportGenerator is failing in Mono llvmfullAOT #62372
  • [API Proposal]: RateLimiter should implement IDisposable and IAsyncDisposable #62370
  • [wasm] Windows/AOT failing tests #62363
    .NET 7.0
  • [wasm] Linux/AOT tests(9) broken #62362
    .NET 7.0
  • [wasm] browser-bench appstart is broken on main #62357
    .NET 7.0
  • Question: How is the API diff made? #62356
  • System.Text.Json source generator does not ignore delegate properties #62354
  • Access violation executing location when closing an application that hosts the .NET 5.0 Runtime via CoreCLRHost #62346
  • Consider adding RegexOptions.RightToLeft support back to compilation #62345
    Future
  • System.Reflection.MethodInfo.CreateDelegate<T> method failing with System.ArgumentException #62366
  • [API Proposal]: System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.AsPtrRef<T, U>(ref T* source) : ref U #62342
  • [iOS/tvOS] Test Failure System.IO.Compression.Tests.ZipFile_Unix.CanZipNamedPipe #62341
  • .NET Standard 2.0 should have an overload of Encoding.GetString() that takes a ReadOnlySpan<byte> parameter. #62340
  • DllImport of MacOS frameworks not working on Big Sur #62337
  • threading/NamedMutex/test1/paltest_namedmutex_test1 failed #62336
  • [mono] Context->method_inst is non-NULL but garbage on AOT #62334
    7.0.0
  • FileSystemGlobbing does not support specifying absolute paths. #62333
  • .NET 6 TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById does not support IANA timezone ids on Windows Server 2016 & 2019 #62329
    Future
  • Dynamic block nodes should not generate non-null assertions #62328
    Future
  • JIT does not recognize Vector<T>.Count and Vector{128|256}.Count is unsigned in div / mod #62326
    7.0.0
  • .net 6 blazor can't publish #62332
  • Crossgen2 does not reliably align data used by CreateSpan<T> #62316
    7.0.0
  • Validate that ilasm/ildasm round-tripping does not lose alignment of FieldRVA data #62315
    7.0.0
  • Reflection.Emit does not reliably allow use of CreateSpan<T> with non 8 byte aligned data #62314
    7.0.0
  • System.Reflection.Metadata does not allow RVA mapped fields to be reliably aligned to 8 byte boundaries #62313
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Intrinsics\\CreateSpan_il\\CreateSpan_il.cmd #62312
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/explicitlayout/NestedStructs/case05/case05.sh #62311
    7.0.0
  • Rfc3161TimestampToken.TryDecode does not work for timestamps in Windows OS libraries Authenticode signatures #62307
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure in JIT/superpmi/superpmicollect/superpmicollect.sh #53321
    Future
  • Test failure in JIT/superpmi/superpmicollect/superpmicollect.sh #32730
    Future
  • Finish "simplified" regex codegen strategy #61902
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `Loader/classloader/explicitlayout/NestedStructs/case04/case04.sh` failing with `FAIL: object and non-object field overlap was not detected` #62303
  • [wasm][aot] Almost all library tests failing on Windows with `RuntimeError: null function or function signature mismatch` #61721
    7.0.0
  • Calling Pipe.Writer.WriteAsync after Pipe.Writer.Advance flush truncated data to the PipeReader. #62167
    7.0.0
  • `DispatchProxy` cannot work with types from collectible assemblies. #62050
    7.0.0
  • DispatchProxy.Create<IProxy, Base> uncastable to Base in custom load context #60468
    7.0.0
  • User Secrets file is required, even when it's excluded in conditional compile #62320
  • System.Windows.Extensions outerloop test SoundPlayerTests.LoadAsync_SourceLocationFromNetwork_Success failing #62305
  • [API Proposal] [.NET 7] [EPIC] : public shared class ->multiple pathway for object oriented constructions (ooc) #62327
  • [mono] custom debugger extenstion #62220
  • WPF : Build Fault-Tolerant Composite Applications in .Net 6 #62272
  • C# Cannot get default value from System.Type class #62274
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\X86Base\\Pause_ro\\Pause_ro.cmd #61901
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • API proposal implementation: DirectoryInfo.Copy / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix SuperPMI unit test 'strip' behavior #62373
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert (#62339) to unblock CI #62371
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Revise the Regex description output in source #62369
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • JIT: three fixes for OSR #62367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert System.DirectoryServices.Protocols and System.Drawing.Common to use GeneratedDllImport #62365
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Remove #ifs in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter #62364
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Remove explicit Exe output types from tests without Main #62361
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Small fix for Crossgen2 execution on Windows #62358
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix a case of hang while allocating at LOH boundary #62355
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Switch over miscellaneous DllImports to GeneratedDllImport. #62353
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Re-enable windows wasm AOT tests #62352
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fixes an issue with FeatureSIMD=0 and ArmBase.Yield #62351
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Fixes #62167. WriteAsync may truncate data if called after .Advance(int) #62350
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fixes #62167. WriteAsync may truncate data if called after .Advance(int) #62348
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 6.0.x
  • Add regex test for parsing runtime-assets expressions #62344
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix bug for Assertion failed '(op3Reg != targetReg) || (op1Reg == targetReg)' during 'Generate code' #62343
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `gtEvalSizeFirst` #62330
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Use Spans on Go() methods for Code Gen engines #62324
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • Fix superpmi.exe handling of exclusion lists #62349
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Always create the AsmDiffs zip file to upload for asmdiff pipeline #62368
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix superpmi.py collect script #62347
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add RateLimiting APIs #61788
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Delete old code generation approach from RegexCompiler / source generator #62318
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Consistently use CreateProxyUri in WebProxy ctors #62338
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Add parser tests from nim-regex #62093
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Update overlapped field test to conflict on 32-bit arches #62308
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Fix the passing/returning of small vtypes. #62299
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Fix a windows cross compiler issue. #62339
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Simplify code emitted for single char repeater #62322
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Disable TestIgnoreCaseRelationBorderCasesInNonBacktracking test #62319
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fixes #62167. WriteAsync may truncate data if called after .Advance(int) #62306
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • [mono] Disable new test running on AOT. #62335
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Support unloadability in `DispatchProxy`. #62095
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix soundplayer assertion failure #62323
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Avoid closure for GetOrAdd #62317
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Move the remainder of X509Certificates and TestUtilities use GeneratedDllImport #62309
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Work around `System.Diagnostics.Tests.StopwatchTests.GetTimestamp` failure #62290
    arch-wasm
  • Ensure that we don't try to get the simdBaseJitType for scalar intrinsics #61982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Reduce repeated variable add operations to a single multiply. #61663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Finish new code gen approach for RegexCompiler / source generator #62268
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Use GeneratedDllImport throughout System.Private.CoreLib. #62295
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Filter blocks to be used for hiding alignment instruction #62262
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] View object attributes - DebugType=full #62278
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update previous netcoreapp version to run API Compat against 6.0 ref pack #61437
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move FabricBot rules to Config-As-Code #62297
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Build improvements, and fixes #61581
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Ensure all types are loaded when methods are accessed as function pointers #62158
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #61713
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Stop marking volatile indirections as `NO_CSE` #62043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Make some icalls return objects using an extra ObjectHandleOnS… #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Add Browsable Attribute support. #62045
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Convert some old style intrinsics to NamedIntrinsic #62271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP]: Accelerate additional cross platform hardware intrinsics #61649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce allocations in code generated by Logging generators (#61162) #62011
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [release/6.0] Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #62286
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Caching, 6.0.2
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 #61934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • Mark static boxes as invariant #62298
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add ETW events for creation of VSD stubs #62255
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete the quirks #61876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Delete `GT_SIMD_CHK` and `GT_HW_INTRINSIC_CHK` #62088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Prevent potential out of bounds write on Android #62275
    area-System.Security
  • Optimize XmlTextEncoder.Write #61773
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Initial version with the following features: #61926
    area-GC-coreclr
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • Add almalinux support #62184
    area-Host
  • Follow up to universal System.Linq.Expressions #62229
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #62209
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update libunwind to v1.6.2 #62092
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
